high_descs: Move to the square wood table to the right of the white chair
Pick up the black square plate to the left of the lamp
Carry the black plate to face the square wood table
Turn on the lamp on top of the table
anns.task_desc: Hold a plate while turning on a lamp

high_descs: turn right, walk towards wall, turn left to face table
pick up the black plate that is on the table
turn around, turn back to face table again
anns.task_desc: examine a plate with a lamp

high_descs: turn to the right and go to the wall and turn to the left and go to the small table
pick up the black plate from the small table
turn to the right and take a step to the wall and turn to the left facing the small table
turn on the lamp light on the small table.
anns.task_desc: examine the black plate by the lamp light
